CustomField.formula: CASE(Status__c, "Request for collection", IMAGE("/resource/RedTrafficLight", "red", 30, 15), "Collected and signed for", IMAGE("/resource/YellowTrafficLight", "yellow", 30, 15), "Returned but damaged", IMAGE("/resource/YellowTrafficLight", "yellow", 30, 15), "Returned and signed", IMAGE("/resource/YellowTrafficLight", "yellow", 30, 15), "Complete", IMAGE("/resource/GreenTrafficLight", "green", 30, 15),IMAGE("/resource/GreenTrafficLight", "green", 30, 15))
CustomField.label: Status Image
